title: Anthropology of Mysticism | Shared Inheritance Seattle Conference - May 2019
description:
Beyond giving us a coherent Christian mysticism, the Hesychastic tradition of the Christian East also offers a general anthropology, a vision and hierarchy of the human person which can give us a way to live in the world today.

From May 2019 Shared Inheritance conference, "Growing in the Likeness of God: Eastern Spirituality in the modern world".

To support this and future conferences, please visit the Shared Inheritance website and make a one-time or recurring donation. For more information, please visit https://www.shared-inheritance.com/ or email them at info@shared-inheritance.com.

Links
website: https://www.shared-inheritance.com/
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SharedInheri...
youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCP9v...
email: info@shared-inheritance.com
